title: Platform Updates | Splits Network
description: The Splits Network changelog — new features, improvements, and what's coming next. Shipped on a two-week cadence.
author: Splits Network

blocks.subtitle: A running record of platform changes, new features, and improvements. We ship on a two-week cadence. Everything significant lands here.

blocks.heading: 2026 Changelog
blocks.subtitle: Major releases and meaningful improvements. Minor patches and bug fixes are tracked in the developer changelog.

steps.title: AI Match Scoring v2 — February 2026
steps.description: Rebuilt the candidate-role matching engine from the ground up. Match scores now include a four-category breakdown: skills alignment, experience depth, location compatibility, and compensation fit. Scores are explainable — every recruiter and hiring manager can see why a candidate ranked where they did. Average placement accuracy improved by 18% in beta.

steps.title: Shared Pipeline Views — January 2026
steps.description: Companies and recruiters now share a single, synchronized pipeline view. Stage changes by either party appear in real time for all authorized users. No more parallel tracking in separate tools. Includes a full audit log with timestamps and user attribution for every action.

steps.title: Stripe Payout Improvements — January 2026
steps.description: Recruiter payout processing migrated to Stripe Connect Express. Payouts now release within 24 hours of the guarantee period end — down from 3–5 business days. Earnings dashboard redesigned with projected payout dates, pending balance breakdown, and full payout history export.

steps.title: Greenhouse Integration — December 2025
steps.description: Greenhouse is now supported as a bi-directional ATS integration. Roles can be imported directly from your Greenhouse account. Candidate submissions and stage updates sync back automatically. OAuth-based setup takes under five minutes. Lever and BambooHR integrations are in closed beta.

steps.title: Role Marketplace Redesign — November 2025
steps.description: The marketplace received a full layout overhaul. Role cards now show fee amounts, split percentages, recruiter engagement count, and time posted at a glance. Advanced filtering by industry, role type, location radius, and fee range. Save searches and get notified when new matching roles are posted.

steps.title: Candidate Database — October 2025
steps.description: Recruiters can now maintain a personal candidate database across all roles and submissions. Tag candidates by skill set, industry, and availability. Notes and interaction history are tracked per candidate. Re-engage past candidates against new roles with one click.

blocks.quote: The shared pipeline view changed how our team collaborates with recruiters. We went from weekly check-in calls to checking the platform. Everything we need is already there.
blocks.citation: Talent Acquisition Lead, Series C SaaS Company

blocks.heading: What We're Building Next
paragraphs: Our roadmap is public and driven by user feedback. Here is what is currently in active development for Q1 and Q2 2026.

Interview scheduling. Native interview coordination between recruiters and hiring teams — without a separate tool. Calendar sync, availability matching, and confirmation notifications. Closed beta in March 2026.

Mobile app. A native iOS and Android app for recruiters who manage their pipeline on the move. Full marketplace access, candidate submissions, messaging, and earnings tracking. Public beta in April 2026.
Lever and BambooHR integrations. Currently in closed beta alongside select enterprise customers. General availability in March 2026.

items.title: Smart Notification Engine
items.description: Consolidated in-app and email notifications. Choose what triggers alerts and how you receive them. No more notification fatigue.

items.title: Resume Parser v3
items.description: Improved extraction of skills, credentials, and experience from unstructured resume formats. Accuracy up 23% from v2.

items.title: Threaded Messaging
items.description: Conversations are now threaded by role and candidate. Context stays organized even across long placements.

items.title: Two-Factor Authentication
items.description: TOTP-based 2FA available for all accounts. Enterprise plans can enforce 2FA organization-wide.

items.title: Analytics Dashboard v2
items.description: Rebuilt analytics with customizable date ranges, funnel visualization, and CSV export for all reports.

items.title: Role Description Assistant
items.description: AI-assisted role description writing. Input the essentials; the assistant drafts a structured, searchable job description.

blocks.heading: Our Development Philosophy
paragraphs: Splits Network ships on a two-week cycle. Each release includes a defined set of improvements — features, fixes, and infrastructure changes — and we don't move goalposts mid-cycle. This discipline keeps our roadmap visible and predictable.

Feature requests from active users carry direct weight in prioritization. We track requests in the open and publish which have been accepted into the roadmap. If you submitted a request that shipped, you'll see it here.

blocks.heading: Shape What We Build Next
blocks.subtitle: Submit a feature request, report a bug, or join our beta program. Your input determines what ships in the next cycle.
